profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs
products: Interior Painting,Exterior Painting,Residential Painting and Commercial Painting,Staircase refinishing, Condo or Apartment Renovations and Handyman Services, Kitchen Design and Build, Home Additions, Structural work, Garage Design and Build, Basement Renovations, Bathroom Renovations, Basement Underpinning and Waterproofing,Custom Cabinetry, Flooring Installation including, Laminate, Hardwood, Engineered, Tiles, Including Porcelain, marble and granite. We also have Master Electricians, Master Plumbers and Gas and HVAC members as a part of our team.
services: House Painters, Office Painting, Exterior Painting, Residential Painting, Wallpaper Installation & Removal, Stucco Removal, Drywall Installation and Plaster repairs, Paint & Wallpaper Retailer save up to 50% off, Demolition, Rough and Finished Carpentry, Home and Renovation advisors, Kitchen Planning and Design, Handyman and Painter for a Day Services, Deck Design and Build, Basement renovations, general contractors
brands: Benjamin Moore, Dulux Paint, and Sherwin Williams. We Believe in not Including Paint and providing you our wholesale Paint Pricing as many of our Competitors include paint in your pricing and then substitute low grade paint. We believe in provide you the best paint for your home and to provide access to our unbelievable wholesale pricing.

Plus our Award Winning Painter and Handyman for a Day Services. Our Painting Services including Kitchen Cabinet Painting and Spraying are specialties. profile:
We are a proffesional Design and Build Landscape Contractor.  We service the Western Toronto, From Etobicoke to Hamilton and beyond.  We take pride in the work we do, and spend time with each an every potential client to ensure the final outcome meets their expectations.  We are not your discount Landscaper, we are meticulous, and set high standards for ourselves.  

We offer Landscape Design, Contruction, and Lighting.  We take on jobs from as small as walkways to as large as complete backyard makeovers.  We have Finished carpenters on staff, so consider us your one stop shop for all your outdoor needs, from decks to interlock patio's, flagstone, to complete outdoor (12v) lighting systems.  

We look forward to hearing from you.  

Lou'ay & Mark

profile:
From the beginning of their company's existence they have been providing their clients with quality services driven by the passion for woodworking and fine carpentry.

***

Stairs4U have been in the custom stairs and flooring business for over two decades serving their clients in the entire Greater Toronto Area. Constantly upgrading their skills and taking advantage of new products and technologies they have earned reputation of trusted professionals in their field of work. The company is known amongst its customers as a result driven team of professionals, always pushing the boundaries of quality, innovation and efficiency on their projects.

***

Today, Stairs4U uses wood and metal to redefine the meaning of quality in creation of their custom stairs and railings. The company also offers refinishing and installation of fine hardwood and laminate flooring. Satisfied clients all over Toronto Greater Area are the best proof of our success built on a perfect marriage of knowledge and passion for what we do.
services:
Custom Stairs/Pickets/Posts/Railing/
Hardwood and Laminate Floors

profile: Tailored Contracting is a home improvement company servicing most of the southern GTA. Our projects range from handyman services to flooring, door and trim installations to bathroom, basement and kitchen renovations to full home/condominium and commercial renovations. We Specialize in Bathroom Renovation, Basement renovation, Bathroom Remodeling, and Kitchen Renovations. All finish and trim carpentry such as, crown molding, baseboards, door installations, casing, wainscoting, drywall, and taping. We undertake work in all budget ranges while providing top quality work with hopes to exceed your expectations. We commit to completing your project in an organized, professional manner. We take pride in tailoring our services to your needs. Our personal expectations demand quality and insured work, completed on time. Do not hesitate to contact us for any questions. Contact us today to schedule your appointment.

profile:
I’m Bryan Smit, and I run this business with my family and close friends. I have been working as a carpenter for eight years in the Greater Toronto Hamilton Area, but have a lifetime of experience in home renovations and the skilled trades.
 
Both of my grandfathers built new lives for their families in Canada as tradesmen—one as a plumber, and one as a mechanic and handyman. As active members in the Dutch community in Southern Ontario, both quickly became known as reliable and skilled labourers always willing to help out with anything from a clogged toilet to a full renovation. That dedication to quality work, that love for working with your hands and providing for your family and the families in your community, has been passed down in my family for generations. My father is a plumber; my brother is a welder; my uncles and cousins work in construction and woodworking; and we always come together when one of us has a project, whether it’s redoing a roof, building a shed, or renovating a bathroom. Combined, we have over 200 years of building, renovation, and repair experience.
 
From a very young age, my parents involved my siblings and me in the family projects, and they instilled in me a passion for constructing something, for the accuracy and attention to detail required, for the feeling of contributing to what makes a family’s house a home.
 
From basements to bedrooms to backyards, Bryan Smit’s Carpentry will help make your house the home your family dreamed of.
 
All of our work is fully bonded and insured.

Follow us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/bryansmitcarpentry/

profile:
MAXLOR Custom Homes & Renovations is a premier construction company with over 25 years of experience. We provide our customers with a solution to their vision(s). We’re dedicated to providing excellent service while meeting the budget that’s set out for the project.

THE ORIGIN OF MAXLOR
The dedicated MAXLOR team, Stephanie and Salomon, use their experience and expertise to complete outstanding remodel and renovation projects.  As a dynamic husband and wife team, they are passionate about honest work and dedicated to their family company, MAXLOR Custom Homes and Renovations. The company was born out of a desire to live the entrepreneur lifestyle and to create a legacy for their four children.  The MAXLOR name is a combination of their son’s names, Maximiliano and Lorenzo, representing the strength and pride they share as a family unit. MAXLOR Custom Homes and Renovations is a company built on integrity.  Salomon brings over 25 years of building experience and a love of intricate carpentry to every project he works on.  Stephanie prides herself on sharp communication skills, strong organizational skills, and the ability to manage a project schedule with precision.  This unstoppable team has the perfect mix of knowledge and talent to design, build and manage a range of remodel, renovation and addition projects.

THE MAXLOR ADVANTAGE
The MAXLOR advantage is the opportunity to work with a team of experts that offer a transparent approach to home remodeling and renovation.  This talented team delivers exceptional quality with a final reveal that is nothing short of divine.  At MAXLOR Custom Homes and Renovations, there is great pride in bringing the client’s vision to life.  

PROUD MEMBER OF LIONSGATE DESIGN COLLECTIVE
The Collective is a curated collection of talented designers, decorators, contractors, home professionals and support staff. We tackle any project and make it easy for you to sit back, relax and make your vision come true. For over 10 years Lionsgate Design Inc. has grown in the business to bring you a carefully vetted team ensuring your project is handled with the greatest knowledge, expertise and style. Any project, large or small, with our full-service team, you're in good hands! https://lionsgatedesign.ca/ 

THE COLLECTIVE CONNECTION PROCESS
We created The Collective Connection Process™ based on our experience working with thousands of clients over many years. We’ve learned that some people do not achieve the best outcomes with their interior designer or contractor because they did not connect first with what they really wanted emotionally. We call this The Disconnected Design Trap™. When you fall into this trap, you waste a lot of time and money, feel stressed, and worried and ultimately do not achieve your vision. This is why we created The Collective Connection Process™.  To get a better outcome, we learned it's important to connect first with what you really want emotionally. By engaging in a Collective Connection Conversation you are taking the first step to avoid the Disconnected Design Trap.  You will feel more relaxed and confident. And you will achieve your vision. Schedule a conversation - https://calendly.com/collectiveconnectionconversation
